trans-unit.target: My body...it feels so heavy...<tab>My body...it feels so heavy...
Oh! Something has changed. I feel...complete.<tab>Oh! I feel I've changed somehow. I feel...complete.
What is this feeling?<tab>What is this feeling?
I sense great power here.<tab>I sense great power here.
Such intense power! Soon it will be a part of me!<tab>Such intense power! Soon I will make it my own!
Fortune smiles upon us today!<tab>Fortune smiles upon us today!
This feels...strange...<tab>Such a strange sensation...
Is this the power of crystals?<tab>Is this the power of crystals?
This power... My body needs time to adjust.<tab>I need time to adjust to this power...
This aether is not quite like yours.<tab>This aether feels familiar, yet somehow different.
The aether... It courses through me!<tab>I can feel the aether welling inside me!
My power...it grows!<tab>My power...it grows!
The aether is almost too much to bear!<tab>I am not sure how much more aether I can hold.
Are you certain this is safe?<tab>This will not harm me?
Soon this power will be mine to command.<tab>Soon I will make this power my own.
Again I sup on the aether of crystals.<tab>Again I feast on the aether of crystals.
I can feel the aether pouring into me.<tab>I can feel the aether flowing into me.
The aether swells inside me.<tab>The aether swells inside me.
With every grain of sand I grow stronger.<tab>With every grain of sand I gain strength.
I have come to like this sand.<tab>I rather like this sand.
Do you have more?<tab>Please, may I have some more?
Mmm... This aether sustains me.<tab>Mmm... This aether sustains me.
Soon I will achieve my full potential!<tab>Soon I will achieve my full potential!
I sense new power within me.<tab>I sense new strength growing within me.
I will repay you in kind.<tab>I shall share this strength with you.
One day I will be worthy of this power.<tab>My strength is yours to command!
I must become stronger!<tab>I will become stronger!
I still have much room to improve.<tab>I still have much room to grow.
This gift will not be wasted.<tab>This gift will not be wasted.
It surges through me!<tab>It surges through me!
Behold my newfound strength!<tab>Behold my newfound strength!
When I am strong enough, no goal will be beyond our reach.<tab>When I am strong enough, no goal will be beyond our reach.
Your enemies will tremble before our might!<tab>Your enemies will tremble before our might!
My spirit has never burned so brightly!<tab>My spirit has never burned so fiercely!
None can stand before our combined strength.<tab>None can stand before our combined strength.
I look forward to putting this power to good use.<tab>I look forward to putting this power to good use.
I must have more aether!<tab>I must have more aether!
I am full to bursting with aether.<tab>I am full to bursting with aether.
What have you got there?<tab>What have you got there?
Have you need of me?<tab>Have you need of me?
Is this a new form of training? Very well.<tab>Is this a new form of training? Very well.
What are you planning to do?<tab>What are you planning to do?
This will not hurt...will it?<tab>This will not hurt...will it?
Will you use the sand again?<tab>Will you use the sand again?
Let us begin.<tab>Let us begin.
Ah, it is time once again to partake of the sand.<tab>Ah, it is time once again to partake of the sand.
I am ready.<tab>I am ready.
You called?<tab>You called?
I have been looking forward to this.<tab>I have been looking forward to this.
More... I must have more.<tab>More... I must have more.
I wish to become stronger...for your sake.<tab>I wish to become stronger...for your sake.
Another chance to grow.<tab>Another chance to grow.
What have you got there?<tab>What have you got there?
Are we going to see that woman again?<tab>Are we going to see that woman again?
Is something the matter?<tab>Is something wrong?
Should I become swifter, or perhaps more attentive?<tab>Should I become swifter, or perhaps more attentive?
Do I appear...different?<tab>Have I...changed somehow?
When will we use the sand again?<tab>When will we use the sand again?
Does my progress please you?<tab>Does my progress please you?
I have grown much since we began.<tab>I have grown much since we began.
I feel I have changed somehow.<tab>I feel I have changed somehow.
What will we focus on next?<tab>What will we focus on next?
I hope I am to your satisfaction.<tab>I hope I am to your satisfaction.
Will we return to the woman soon? I wish to use more sand.<tab>Will we return to the woman soon? I wish to use more sand.
I feel I have developed quite well, would you not agree?<tab>I feel I have developed quite well, would you not agree?
It makes me nervous when you stare like that.<tab>It makes me nervous when you stare like that.
Untreated sand? But the woman said not to use that...<tab>Untreated sand? But the woman said not to use that...
